definition: classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

sentences.english: Do you like reading classics or popular novels?
sentences.chinese: 你喜歡閱讀古典作品還是通俗小說？

sentences.english: The popular fiction displays the unique and broad conveyance of nativeness.
sentences.chinese: 這些通俗小說中蘊含了獨特而廣泛的本土傳遞。

sentences.english: Soap opera is for TV what the popular novel is for books.
sentences.chinese: 肥皂劇之於電視，猶如通俗小說之於書籍。

sentences.english: Alexandre Dumas is one of the best popular historical novelists in France.
sentences.chinese: 大仲馬是法國著名的歷史通俗小說家。

sentences.english: Sanyan and Erpai was representative of popular novels.
sentences.chinese: 三言二拍便是這類通俗小說的代表。
